content.question: If <math alttext="y equals, e raised to the x cubed power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, then <math alttext="the second derivative of y, with respect to x, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="18 times x cubed, times e raised to the x cubed power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mn>18</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="9 times x to the fourth power, times e raised to the 2 times x cubed power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mn>9</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, 6 x, plus 3 times x squared, close parenthesis, times e raised to the x cubed power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>6</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, 6 x, plus 9 times x to the fourth power, close parenthesis, times e raised to the x cubed power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>6</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>9</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open parenthesis, 6 x, plus 9 times x to the fourth power, close parenthesis, times e raised to the x cubed power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>6</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>9</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

unit.text: 3: Differentiation: Composite, Implicit, and Inverse Functions

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
